Free installation and 1 Year warranty

settings.heading: What's Inside the Box
settings.content:
• 1x Broen® Obsidian Smart Lock
  • 2x RFID Key Cards (+₱50 for additional cards)
  • 2x Mechanical Keys (Cannot be duplicated)

settings.heading: Installation Details
settings.content:
• Free Installation for orders placed before Mar. 20, 2025 in our covered areas.

  • Our sales team will contact you through the phone number provided to schedule the installation of your Broen Smart Lock.

settings.heading: Warranty & Support
settings.content:
• Broen offers a 1-year warranty period for any factory defect related issues with an instant replacement if deemed necessary. 
  • A dedicated 24/7 support team is ready to assist you with your concerns.

settings.heading: Shipping
settings.content:
We are proud to offer free nationwide shipping on all orders.

Metro Manila: 2-3 working days
Provincial: 4-5 working days
Islands: 5-10 working days

All orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days. In peak periods please allow for up to 6 days for dispatch.

Delivery Schedule
We ship orders Monday through Friday excluding weekends and holidays due to available courier services.
